    • NetworkHandler

      public NetworkHandler(Client owner, ClientMessageVisitor messageVisitor) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException, TimeoutException, IOException
      default constructor
      Parameters:
      owner - client instance
      messageVisitor - client message handler
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - if there are problem during execution
      InterruptedException - if the network gets interrupted
      TimeoutException - if there's a timeout on the connection
      IOException - input output problems
